column3:
Awesome, just was about to open the pull myself.

utACK  4a04879
ugh, went a bit too fast there\nThanks. ACK.\n
Travis should re-evaluate pulls every 10 days, imo. The travis result from #7194 was more than 30 days old.\n
I usually manually check after merging (but before pushing), but skipped in this case as I wanted to merge a bunch low-risk/trivial ones at the same time. Bad idea.\n
